name: The Ultimate Event
overview: Published in 64'er 1991/05, and 64'er 1991/07, and also 64'er Sonderheft 85, The Ultimate Event is YOU, riding your gun-mounted hover-board down the beach boardwalk while squadrons of colored balloon try to flee past you like Edokko fleeing Godzilla. But you don't just let them flee past to the safety of the Kaiju Shelters, you must blast as many as humanly possible! Miss too many and it is time for the next contestant. Ultimate!
